label: 2m Amateur Radio (APAC)
description: Amateur radio band for the Asia-Pacific region in the VHF spectrum.

label: APAC VHF Band (Band I)
description: Used for FM radio, television broadcasting, and mobile communications.

label: 4m Amateur Radio (APAC)
description: Amateur radio band in the Asia-Pacific region in the VHF spectrum.

label: Marine VHF Band (APAC)
description: Channels for maritime communication and distress.

label: 915 MHz ISM Band (APAC)
description: Unlicensed band for IoT, LoRa, and other wireless communication.

label: UHF TV Band (APAC)
description: Band used for television broadcasts in the UHF spectrum.
